What amazing game..
I like the game rlly fun and hard kepp the good work.

Enjoy the experience of top-fragging in your team, with a LEM smurf on the other side while your team has "Mr. High Russian" with 5 points on half switch. This game isn't for everyone, you practice your aim every day to miss hs on afk guy cause bullet rng, and sometimes you shoot wall so you get 1 bullet ace it happens.
This game consists of very skilled players like "im not smurfing" with 60h and 0 medals, and the "mr spiggly wiggly" who just bought new mouse skates so he can spin 360 very easily.
You can go on maps like de_dust2 or de_mirage, or de_inferno rarely.
The first two maps will contain a 6 year old player on your team, and the entirity of Na'Vi on the enemy side. You take pistol round and end up loosing 1/16 cause cool man toggled his penis keyboard on and started to go bam bam trough walls.

8/10 i want to kms

I have been playing csgo for over than 4 years and i am enjoing every moment playing.
But there are a lot of hackers that can ruin your day...
Workshops for this game will definitely help you in aim and other skills!
